label: 後藤象二郎
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
説明文: (1838-97). Tosa hirazamurai (150 koku), related by marriage to Yoshida Toyo. Leader of Tosa after 1864; raised to Karo rank (1,500 koku). Active in intrigues leading to Restoration. Senior member of early Meiji government. Later engaged in party politics and business enterprises.
